1.text: Place an egg in a pot full of water.

6.text: Place the egg on top of the bottle.

7.text: Watch the egg squeeze into the bottle.
7.vid: /5/50/Get an Egg Into a Bottle Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Stick the birthday candles in one end of the egg.

9.vid: /f/f8/Get an Egg Into a Bottle Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Put the candles in an upside-down bottle.

11.text: Watch the egg go into the bottle.

12.text: Explain how it works to your friends.
